findings.title: Division Before Multiplication
findings.description: The rounding error from the division before multiplication can cause the company's earnings to be slightly miscalculated.

findings.title: Improper Free Character Validation in createCharacter() Function
findings.description: The attacker can mint the free character as an NFT, which conflicts with the business design due to lack of validation for idToCreateCharacterFee and isFreeCharacter state in createCharacter() function.

findings.title: Lack of NFT Contract Validation
findings.description: The attacker can supply a malicious NFT contract as a parameter in various functions to abuse the business logic, resulting in the loss of users' platform assets.

findings.title: Lack of Collateral Ofefr Status Validation
findings.description: Unchecked collateral ofefr status validation allows the loanee to claim the collateral asset without paying back the loan.

findings.title: Lack of Investment Status Validation
findings.description: The contract does not validate if the investment is already successful before allowing withdrawals.

findings.title: Insecure Randomness in openBox() Function
findings.description: The attacker can control the random result to select a specific NFT when opening the box, giving an unfair advantage to the platform's users.

findings.title: Lack of Closed Arena Validation
findings.description: The cancelArenaRegistration() function does not validate if the arena is closed before allowing users to cancel their registration and retrieve upfront fees.

findings.title: Incorrect Change State Operator in finalizeAuction() Function
findings.description: The auction status is not changed after it is finalized. The attacker can take advantage of this flaw to drain all $NGL from the contract.

findings.title: Improper cancelCounterOffer() Function Implementation
findings.description: After the cancelCounterOffer() function is called, the counter ofefr is not completely removed, resulting in the collateral NFT being unable to be withdrawn from the contract.
